name: The Beseeching Parliament
description:
The Beseeching Parliament is an investigation-focused adventure for Dungeons and Dragons, intended for levels 1-3.

The adventure takes players to work as hired help for a local strongman, who has problems of his own and no small amount of treasure in his manor. The characters can choose the low road of premeditated murder and robbery, or work towards understanding, compassion and resolution for a family in shambles.

The Beseeching parliament is 40 pages long, providing content for a session or two.

The adventure can be used as an introductory adventure for new players, and is easily transferable for any D&D system.

Created by Pekka Rihko, layout by Perttu Vedenoja, art by Riku Yliviuhkola.
